trans-unit.source: docs
trans-unit.target: docs

trans-unit.source: License FAQs
trans-unit.target: License FAQs

trans-unit.source: Commonly asked questions about Bootstrap's open source license.
trans-unit.target: Commonly asked questions about Bootstrap's open source license.

trans-unit.source: about
trans-unit.target: about

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap is released under the MIT license and is copyright {{< year >}}. Boiled down to smaller chunks, it can be described with the following conditions.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap is released under the MIT license and is copyright {{< year >}}. Boiled down to smaller chunks, it can be described with the following conditions.

trans-unit.source: It requires you to:
trans-unit.target: It requires you to:

trans-unit.source: Keep the license and copyright notice included in Bootstrap's CSS and JavaScript files when you use them in your works
trans-unit.target: Keep the license and copyright notice included in Bootstrap's CSS and JavaScript files when you use them in your works

trans-unit.source: It permits you to:
trans-unit.target: It permits you to:

trans-unit.source: Freely download and use Bootstrap, in whole or in part, for personal, private, company internal, or commercial purposes
trans-unit.target: Freely download and use Bootstrap, in whole or in part, for personal, private, company internal, or commercial purposes

trans-unit.source: Use Bootstrap in packages or distributions that you create
trans-unit.target: Use Bootstrap in packages or distributions that you create

trans-unit.source: Modify the source code
trans-unit.target: Modify the source code

trans-unit.source: Grant a sublicense to modify and distribute Bootstrap to third parties not included in the license
trans-unit.target: Grant a sublicense to modify and distribute Bootstrap to third parties not included in the license

trans-unit.source: It forbids you to:
trans-unit.target: It forbids you to:

trans-unit.source: Hold the authors and license owners liable for damages as Bootstrap is provided without warranty
trans-unit.target: Hold the authors and license owners liable for damages as Bootstrap is provided without warranty

trans-unit.source: Hold the creators or copyright holders of Bootstrap liable
trans-unit.target: Hold the creators or copyright holders of Bootstrap liable

trans-unit.source: Redistribute any piece of Bootstrap without proper attribution
trans-unit.target: Redistribute any piece of Bootstrap without proper attribution

trans-unit.source: Use any marks owned by Bootstrap in any way that might state or imply that Bootstrap endorses your distribution
trans-unit.target: Use any marks owned by Bootstrap in any way that might state or imply that Bootstrap endorses your distribution

trans-unit.source: Use any marks owned by Bootstrap in any way that might state or imply that you created the Bootstrap software in question
trans-unit.target: Use any marks owned by Bootstrap in any way that might state or imply that you created the Bootstrap software in question

trans-unit.source: It does not require you to:
trans-unit.target: It does not require you to:

trans-unit.source: Include the source of Bootstrap itself, or of any modifications you may have made to it, in any redistribution you may assemble that includes it
trans-unit.target: Include the source of Bootstrap itself, or of any modifications you may have made to it, in any redistribution you may assemble that includes it

trans-unit.source: Submit changes that you make to Bootstrap back to the Bootstrap project (though such feedback is encouraged)
trans-unit.target: Submit changes that you make to Bootstrap back to the Bootstrap project (though such feedback is encouraged)

trans-unit.source: The full Bootstrap license is located in the project repository for more information.
trans-unit.target: The full Bootstrap license is located in the project repository for more information.
